bibl.title: From Temple to Church. Destruction and Renewal of Local Cultic Topography in Late Antiquity
bibl.seg: BAGNALL Roger S., Models and Evidence in the Study of Religion in Late Roman Egypt.

Johannes HAHN, Stephen EMMEL and Ulrich GOTTER (Edd.), From Temple to Church. Destruction and Renewal of Local Cultic Topography in Late Antiquity = Religions in the Graeco-Roman World. 163 (Leiden - Boston, 2008) pp. 23-41.
